statements: SELECT * FROM stock_alerts;
SELECT product_name, current_stock_level FROM stock_alerts WHERE current_stock_level < threshold;
SELECT product_name, current_stock_level, threshold FROM stock_alerts WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT * FROM stock_alerts ORDER BY current_stock_level DESC, alert_id ASC;
SELECT alert_id, product_name, current_stock_level FROM stock_alerts WHERE current_stock_level > 50 AND threshold < 20;
SELECT * FROM stock_alerts WHERE current_stock_level > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT alert_id, product_name, current_stock_level FROM stock_alerts WHERE threshold < 50 ORDER BY current_stock_level DESC;
SELECT product_name, threshold FROM stock_alerts WHERE current_stock_level BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM stock_alerts WHERE product_name LIKE 'S%' AND threshold >= 75;
SELECT alert_id, threshold FROM stock_alerts WHERE current_stock_level < 50 AND threshold < 100 ORDER BY alert_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM alerts;
SELECT alert_id, product_id, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE stock_level > 10;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM products WHERE max_stock > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, max_stock FROM products WHERE current_stock < max_stock ORDER BY max_stock DESC;
SELECT product_id, stock_level, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE current_stock < 50);
SELECT * FROM products WHERE current_stock < max_stock;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM products WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT MAX(current_stock) AS max_stock FROM products;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, max_stock FROM products JOIN alerts ON products.product_id = alerts.product_id;
SELECT AVG(current_stock) AS avg_stock FROM products;
SELECT * FROM StockLevels WHERE stock_level > 100;
SELECT product_id, stock_level FROM StockLevels ORDER BY stock_level DESC;
SELECT product_id, alert_message FROM Alerts WHERE alert_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, out_of_stock_since FROM OutOfStock ORDER BY out_of_stock_since ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM StockLevels WHERE stock_level < 50;
SELECT * FROM StockLevels WHERE stock_level > 10
SELECT product_id, stock_level FROM StockLevels ORDER BY stock_level DESC
SELECT product_id, alert_message FROM Alerts WHERE product_id = 5
SELECT * FROM OutOfStock WHERE out_of_stock_since BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT product_id, count(*) as count FROM OutOfStock GROUP BY product_id HAVING count > 1
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products WHERE stock_level < 10;
SELECT * FROM alert_rules WHERE alert_threshold > 50;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC, stock_level ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_level > 50;
SELECT product_name, stock_level, price FROM products WHERE price >= 20 ORDER BY stock_level DESC;

SELECT alert_rules.rule_name, alert_logs.alert_timestamp, alert_logs.alerted_quantity FROM alert_rules INNER JOIN alert_logs ON alert_rules.rule_id = alert_logs.rule_id WHERE alert_logs.alerted_quantity > 0 ORDER BY alert_logs.alert_timestamp DESC;

SELECT notifications.notification_text, products.product_name, notifications.notification_timestamp FROM notifications INNER JOIN products ON notifications.product_id = products.product_id ORDER BY notifications.notification_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM alerts;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT notification_message FROM notifications WHERE alert_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, email_notifications FROM settings ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_threshold > 50;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT notification_message FROM notifications WHERE alert_id = 3 AND user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, email_notifications FROM settings WHERE user_id = 5;
